You can now find Appcelerator documentation at https://docs.axway.com/. This site will be taken down in the near future.

Alloy 1.9.5 - 29 November 2016

Alloy 1.9.5 is a patch release that includes two bug fixes.

Fixed issues

  • ALOY-1517 - UI elements are not created properly with formFactor property in style

  • ALOY-1527 - Cannot use Ti.UI.iOS.TabbedBar in ListView template
